SEARCH
Package emissary.parser

Class SimpleParser

java.lang.Object
emissary.parser.SessionParser
emissary.parser.SimpleParser
@Deprecated public class SimpleParser extends SessionParser
Deprecated.
A very simple minded parser implementation that assumes each input set of data bytes is one session This parser has no idea about headers and footers, just the basic session, and not much of an idea about that. This class is deprecated, use SimpleNioParser

    • decomposeSession

      protected DecomposedSession decomposeSession(@Nullable InputSession session)
      Deprecated.
      Creates a hashtable of elements from the session: header, footer, body, and other meta data values extracted from the session data.
      Parameters:
      session - The session to be decomposed into separate elements.
      Returns:
      A map of session elements.

      Deprecated.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the renamed field or the original name if no change

    • getNextSession

      public DecomposedSession getNextSession() throws ParserException, ParserEOFException
      Deprecated.
      Creates a hashtable of elements from the session: header, footer, body, and other meta data values extracted from the session data for the next session in the data. This Simple base implementation only treats the whole file as one session
      Specified by:
      getNextSession in class SessionParser
      Returns:
      the DecomposedSession
      Throws:
      ParserException - when parsing cannot be completed
      ParserEOFException - when the last session has already been parsed
